headline: 2001 - Cholera in Nigeria
main_text: As of 14 November 2001, Nigeria has reported a total of 724 cases and 52 deaths. The following areas have been affected: AKWA Ibom State, Opkoso health district: 25 cases and 8 deaths. KWARA State, Bode Saadu : 124 cases and 16 deaths. KANO State, Kano Metropolis: 575 cases and 28 deaths.  WHO has provided cholera kits and technical assistance for outbreak investigation and control.
